about.description: I'm from Tucuman, Argentina. When I started my college stage I signed up for systems engineering so I'll be able to understand and learn more about the IT world. I was very convinced that my focus was more about programming so I decided to give my life that direction and I started studying web development until I graduated as a fullstack developer. I am a programmer looking for a work team to be able to apply all my knowledge, gain some experience, learn more and grow professionally in this career.

projects.Movye: Web application to search movies, order and filter them. It also allows to add movies to favorites and watchlist. Technologies: Next.js and styled components.
projects.Arthub: E-commerce web for selling artworks. It was done in group, using the SCRUM methodology. Technologies: React, Redux, Express, Sequelize, Firebase, PostgreSQL and authentication with JWT.
projects.Memotest: Classic memotest game, with the possibility of choosing 2 themes. Technologies: typescript and styled components
projects.PI - Dogs: Fullstack single project. It consists of an application that shows information about all dog breeds, it's also possible to create new breeds. Technologies: React, Redux, Express, Sequelize and PostgreSQL.
projects.App-Clima: Web application made with React. It allows to search for weather data from any city in the world.
